name: MAC address
description: Matches MAC addresses in the following forms, taking care of correct hexadecimal representation:af:01:bc:02:de:03AF:01:BC:02:DE:03af-01-bc-02-de-03AF-01-BC-02-DE-03af 01 bc 02 de 03AF 01 BC 02 DE 03AF01BC-02DE03af01bc-02de03AF01BC:02DE03af01bc:02de03AF01BC-02DE03af01bc02de03
author: Cezar Fistik
